full_text:
as NFL week 1 sneaks up on us, we took a look at how spreads have shifted over the course of the summer since initial release earlier in the year. most matchups pretty steady, in the 1/2 point range (games that had zero movement were omitted)

#nflverse #sportfoliokings https://t.co/iWx3oGGaR5
@AllanLyngberg @rstatstweet Yup! You can get the logo urls from #nflverse 's {nflreadr} package, and then use gt::web_image() to embed it into the table.
